title: The Heart of the Stone
description: As a Stonewiser, Sariah can read the stories hidden deep within the sacred stones. She has the power to witness the past and change the future.But when she discovers dangerous lies that have been interwoven with the truth in the stones, she is forced to turn to her a man who is as intoxicating as he is powerful... ...and her world won't ever be the same again.
author: Dora Machado
